description: React functional component named 'Banner' that renders a stylized banner section with customizable title, subtitle, alignment, and optional children elements. It includes styling for background, shadows, curved edges, and decorative shapes.

methods.name: Banner({  title = "Welcome back!",  subtitle = "Manage, monitor, and optimize your cloud with ease", align = "left", children, })
